About me

My name is Ernest Ojeh. I'm currently based in Amsterdam, working at Booking.com as a User Interface & Experience designer.

Before working with Booking.com, I worked at Konga.com - One of the large ecommerce companies in Nigeria building out the payment vertical of the company, and before that I worked briefly at Andela.


"I've worked across startups, to consulting and working with small and large companies."


I started my career working in a startup while consulting for small and large companies, and I had to to work across multiple roles including product design, print design and web development. My expertise include user research, usability testing and front-end implementation.

I have a background in graphic design, architecture and urban planning.

I'm currently unavailable for work, but if you just want to chat, you can contact me.
